meanings.sent1: She temerariously jumped off the swing without looking.
meanings.sent2: He drove temerariously through the storm despite the warnings.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel temerariously stole a cookie from the picnic.
meanings.sent4: The young explorer temerariously ventured into the dark cave.
meanings.sent5: The firefighter temerariously rushed into the burning building to save the cat.

meanings.definition: In a daring or bold manner
meanings.sent1: The acrobat temerariously performed a backflip on the tightrope.
meanings.sent2: She temerariously challenged the champion to a duel.
meanings.sent3: The penguin temerariously waddled across the icy pond.
meanings.sent4: The artist temerariously painted with bold, vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The knight temerariously charged into battle against the dragon.
